sentence: Thursday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 7,442.12.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.43 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 1.57 to 1 ratio.
There were 1164 advancers and 1831 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 58 stocks reached a 52 week high and 28 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -.12% for the day; a total of -8.64 points.
Dollar Tree, Inc. ( DLTR ) had the largest percent change down (-14.28%) while Expedia Group, Inc. ( EXPE ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.56%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -1.02% for the day; a total of -251.94 points.
Procter & Gamble Company (The) ( PG ) had the largest percent change down (-2.3%) while Visa Inc. ( V ) had the largest percent change gain rising .06%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
